intro.title: 1. Introduction and Acceptance
intro.content: MicroD√©fis is a free personal challenge application developed by Sabrina Dubois' team (hereinafter referred to as "we", "us" or "the Team"). By creating an account or using the application, you fully agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the application. Last updated: February 1, 2026.

account.title: 2. Account Creation and Management
account.content: You must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to create an account. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials (email and password). Please notify us immediately of any unauthorized use. We may suspend or delete an account in case of violation of these terms.

usage.title: 3. Use of the Application and Challenges
usage.content: The application is intended for personal and non-commercial use. You may participate in the challenges provided, but any cheating or circumvention of the rules (for example use of bots or fraudulent sharing) will result in immediate suspension. You must respect other users and refrain from posting illegal or harassing content.

forbidden.title: 4. Prohibited Uses
forbidden.content: Reverse engineering, decompilation, unauthorized mass distribution, use of malware, or any action that may harm the proper functioning of the application is strictly prohibited. The application is free of charge; any attempt to monetize it without written authorization is forbidden.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The application, logos, challenges, icons, and all content are our exclusive property and are protected by copyright and trademark laws. Personal use is permitted. Any reproduction, modification, or distribution without prior written permission is strictly prohibited.

data.title: 6. Personal Data and GDPR
data.content: Your personal data (email, progress, statistics) are processed solely for the operation of the application. Data controller: Sabrina Dubois : contact@microdefis.fr.
data.content3: for more details about the collection and use of your data.
data.content4: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data by contacting us at this address. We comply with GDPR regulations and never sell your data.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The application is provided "as is". We do not guarantee the absence of errors or bugs nor that it will meet your specific needs. We are not liable for indirect losses, data loss, or damages resulting from the use of the application, except in cases of gross negligence or willful misconduct. Force majeure events are excluded.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: You may delete your account at any time via the application settings. We may suspend or terminate an account in case of violation of these terms without prior notice. Certain obligations, including confidentiality obligations, survive termination.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Any changes will be notified via the application or by email. Continued use of the application constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. We encourage you to review this page regularly.

law.title: 10. Governing Law and Disputes
law.content: These terms are governed exclusively by French law. In case of dispute, mediation may be initiated via the CNCM mediator (https://www.mediation-conso.fr). Failing amicable resolution, exclusive jurisdiction is granted to the Paris Court.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at: contact@microdefis.fr.

faqs.question: How to start challenges?
faqs.answer: Open the challenge ‚Üí Complete it ‚Üí "Validate" (option: photo proof). Streak updates instantly!

faqs.question: How to validate a challenge?
faqs.answer: Open the challenge ‚Üí Do it ‚Üí "‚úì Validated" button at the bottom. Progress + streak updates instantly.

faqs.question: What is my streak?
faqs.answer: Series of consecutive completed challenges. Ex: 7d = streak 7. Lost if 1 day missed.

faqs.question: Where to see my progress?
faqs.answer: Bottom menu ‚Üí Profile/Stats: list of completed challenges, current streak, total completed, simple graph.

faqs.question: Didn't receive signup link?
faqs.answer: Check spam/promotions. Request new one via "Restart" button or support@microdefis.com.

faqs.question: Share my stats?
faqs.answer: Profile ‚Üí "Share" button ‚Üí Streak image ready (copy/Whatsapp). Anonymous.

faqs.question: Notifications/reminders?
faqs.answer: Enable push notifications (first launch). Daily streak reminders.

faqs.question: Change language?
faqs.answer: Settings ‚Üí "Language" ‚Üí Choose French/English. Restart app to apply.

faqs.question: Technical issue?
faqs.answer: 1. Refresh page. 2. Clear cache (browser settings). 3. Contact support@microdefis.com +: App version? Browser? Screenshot? Exact step?

faqs.question: Personal data?
faqs.answer: Email + progress stored (GDPR). See /privacy. Request deletion.

faqs.question: Notifications not working?
faqs.answer: Settings ‚Üí "Notifications" ‚Üí Enable push. Check app permissions (iOS/Android).

faqs.question: Delete my account?
faqs.answer: Settings ‚Üí "Delete account" ‚Üí Confirm email. Data erased in 30d (GDPR).

faqs.question: Share my streak?
faqs.answer: Profile ‚Üí "Share" ‚Üí Image ready (Twitter/Insta/WhatsApp). Anonymous by default.

privacy.title: üîí MicroChallenges Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text1: The MicroChallenges development team (Sabrina Dubois, France; contact: contact@microdefis.fr) is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679).
privacy.intro_text2: This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data in the MicroChallenges app. Date: February 1, 2026.
privacy.data_technical: Technical: challenge progress, streaks, device ID, anonymized IP.
privacy.legal_usage: Uses: account management, challenge tracking, notifications, anonymous analytics, support.
privacy.share_intro: No sale or commercial sharing. Limited recipients:
privacy.retention_text: Active account: duration of use + 1 year. Deleted account: 30 days (except legal obligations: 5 years). Security logs: 6 months.
privacy.security_text: Measures: HTTPS encryption, secure storage, restricted access. Breach notification within 72 hours if high risk.
privacy.cookies_text: Essential cookies for session and security. Anonymous analytics with consent. No advertising trackers.
privacy.rights_text: Access, rectification, objection, portability, right to erasure, and restriction. Via app settings or email contact@microdefis.fr (response within 1 month). Complaint possible with your data protection authority.
privacy.transfer_text: No transfers outside the EU except certified tools with contractual safeguards. Servers located in the EU.
privacy.changes_text: Updates will be notified via app or email. Continued use implies acceptance.
